bib.title: Describing fine spatiotemporal dynamics of rat fleas in an insular ecosystem enlightens abiotic drivers of murine typhus incidence in humans
bib.author: A. TRAN and G. LE MINTER and E. BALLEYDIER and A. ETHEVES and M. LAVAL and F. BOUCHER and V. GUERNIER and E. LAGADEC and P. MAVINGUI and E. CARDINALE and P. TORTOSA
